Summary: Digital picture showed UFO on later examination
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around May 18th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsthe picture was taken in pittsburgh, pa at 11:20am on may 18, 2009, in frick park looking west in the grassed area shown in the satellite picture. the black rectangle in the satellite picture shows the approximate location of the photographer. a hawk had just taken flight from the large tree close to the center of the satellite picture. the picture shows the object below and to the left of the hawk. the hawk was the intended subject of the photograph and the object was only noticed on later viewing of the image. the picture is a full frame image, no cropping or post processing. photographic details are 24mm-105mm f4 is lens at 105mm, canon 5d mark 2, f11, 1\1000 sec, iso 500, sharpness 1, auto white balance, image stabilized.
